Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the injury to Rahul Gandhi by stating that he has a bruised face and a black eye, when in fact the image is doctored and there is no evidence of any physical harm.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is doctored by presenting it as a genuine picture of Rahul Gandhi with injuries.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no credible evidence or sources to back up the claim that Rahul Gandhi was physically assaulted.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the doctored image is a true representation of an actual event, without questioning its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation by stating that the image is doctored and provides evidence from multiple sources to support this conclusion.
